description: "This early 18th century maritime map charts the waters between the islands of Java, Madura and Bally (Bali). The web of lines is a rhumbline network, while the numbers indicate sea depth (bathymetry), both used to aide navigation."
label: "A large draught of the east end of Java and Madura shewing the Streights of Bally / by Sam Thornton at the sign of England Scotland and Ireland in the Minories London."
